text:
MSM lies about COVID-19:

- Trump told people to eat fish tank cleaner (he didn’t)
- Trump disbanded WH pandemic office (he didn’t)
- Trump defunded CDC (he didn’t)
- Trump called covid19 a hoax (he didn’t)
- Trump’s China travel ban is racist (it’s not)

Don’t listen to the MSM!
